_header: Sithen that Britain was bigged and Brutus it owned
Subjects: allegory; dream visions; debates; satires; national policy, discussions on
_description: Wynnere and Wastoure — in unrhyming alliterative verse

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Sythen that Bretayne was biggede and Bruyttus it AughteThurgh the takynge of Troye with tresone with Inne…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …& sythen layren as I come with knyghtes þat me foloenTo þat kirke of Colayne þer þe kynges ligges…
BLAdd31042.Note: Ends imperfectly at bottom of second column.
BLAdd31042.Attributed Title: Here Begynnes A Tretys and god Schorte Refreyte By twixe Wynnere and Wastoure (f. 176v)
